- Handle client inquiries via phone, email, and messaging platforms
- Provide professional support to customers and vendors
- Maintain records of client communications
- Assist in daily operations and reporting
- Work closely with the operations team to ensure smooth service delivery

Requirements:
Female candidate (student or fresh graduate preferred)
Good communication skills in Bangla & English
Basic computer knowledge (MS Office, email, WhatsApp/other communication tools)
Positive attitude and willingness to learn

What We Offer:
- Hands-on experience in the transport & logistics industry
- Friendly and supportive work environment
- Internship certificate upon completion

Full-time

Working Hours
8 hours

Shift

Company Benefits
- Lunch Facilities: Partially Subsidized
- Salary Review: Yearly

- Promoting medical products in doctors' chambers, clinics, hospitals, and pharmacies

location: Uttara, Notun Bajar, Panthapath, Rajarbagh, Rampura
job_description:
Responsibilities: In Uttara, Dhalibari (Bhatara), Rajarbag, Panthapath, Rampura, and Banani areas, there is a vacancy for Delivery Associates. Salary: 8360 - 11960 Taka Benefits: 1 day off after every 2 days, 10 days off per month. Shift timings: 7 AM, 9 AM, and 10:45 AM. 12-hour duty with 1-hour break time. Delivery Bonus: A bonus of 10 Taka is given for each delivery from 18 to 24 deliveries. After 24 deliveries, a bonus of 15 Taka is given for all deliveries. Incentive scheme is available. Other benefits: Six-monthly salary increment. Twice a year festival allowance. 14 days sick leave per year after six months. 11 days festival leave per year after six months. 12 days annual leave per year after six months. 10 days casual leave per year after six months.

Requirements: Terms and Conditions: The individual must be 18 years old or above as per birth registration or national ID card.

Responsibilities: Responsibility:
- Identify and solve electrical faults in homes and offices
- Work on tasks related to switches, sockets, lights, fans, circuit breakers, and wiring
- Perform new electrical installations and maintenance work
- Follow safety regulations while working

Qualifications:
- Must have practical experience in electrical work as an electrician
- Good understanding of residential and commercial electrical work
- Must be responsible and punctual

Salary and Benefits:
- Attractive salary based on experience
- Regular work opportunities
- Incentive based on work performance

company_address: Green Satmahal Holdings, 206тАУ208, 4th Floor, Suite 404, Outer Circular Road, Moghbazar, Dhaka 1217
job_description:
Responsibilities: USA | Canada | UK | Ireland | Australia | New Zealand | Malaysia Candidate Profile (Who Should Apply) тАв ┬а ┬аApplicants with Honors in any discipline; preference for Business, CSE, English, or related fields. тАв ┬а ┬аCandidates with minimum 2 years of experience in education consultancy, student counseling. тАв ┬а ┬аStrong communication, interpersonal, and counseling abilities with a good understanding of international admission workflows. тАв ┬а ┬аCapable of guiding students effectively, conducting structured follow-ups, and managing documentation with accuracy and professionalism. тАв ┬а ┬аConfident, target-driven, and able to work efficiently in a fast-paced, client-facing environment.

Requirements: тАв Understanding of international education systems, university requirements, and visa processes.
тАв Ability to assess student profiles, recommend suitable courses/universities, and manage complete application pipelines.
тАв Communication proficiency across email, phone, WhatsApp, and face-to-face counseling.
тАв Basic computer literacy, including Google Docs, Sheets, and CRM/lead management tools.
тАв Preferred: Experience in education fairs, seminars, student interviews, and liaising with global partner institutions.

company_address: Rupayan Trade Center 17 Floor, 114 Kazi Nazrul Islam Avenue Banglamotor, Dhaka 1000, Dhaka, Bangladesh
job_description:
Responsibilities: Ensure timely execution of daily store operations and maintain efficient and effective performance. Provide leadership, motivation, and supervision to sales associates. Maintain high standards of customer service. Manage inventory, stock levels, and product displays. Monitor sales targets and assist in achieving monthly and quarterly goals. Handle customer inquiries, complaints, and returns professionally. Implement training and development programs for employees to enhance team performance. Maintain cleanliness and orderly environment in the store.

Requirements: Duty starts when the Shop opens- 10 AM to 8 PM ЁЯСЧDress Code Mandatory like a blazer Female candidates only. Marital Status: Married or divorced. Unmarried candidates not eligible. Must have leadership and team management skills. Must have customer service and communication skills. Prior experience in inventory and sales management will be given preference.

Responsibilities: If you want to learn sales and marketing, talk to clients, convince them, and work in the sales flow, there is an opportunity at Kinative. We work on eCommerce Development, Digital Marketing, AV Making, AI-based Solutions, and Resort Management System. Now we are looking for a Business Development Intern who will gain real-life experience with our team, learn lead generation, and work in our sales process. Responsibilities: Find new clients - generate leads through social media, email, and phone calls Talk to clients - explain our services and convince them Learn the sales process - learn real-world business development with the team Market analysis - understand trends and target new clients

**Organization:** Headman Academy - School of English

**Job Position:** English Language Teacher (Kids & Adults)

---

**Job Responsibilities:**
- Teach English to kids and adult learners
- Conduct interactive and communicative classes
- Prepare lesson plans and teaching materials
- Evaluate students' progress and provide feedback
- Maintain a friendly and disciplined classroom environment

---

**Requirements:**
- Good command of spoken and written English
- Teaching experience preferred (Freshers may apply)
- Passionate about teaching and working with students
- Good communication and presentation skills

---

**Job Type:** Full-time / Part-time (as per discussion)

**Salary:** Attractive (based on experience & performance)

---

Responsibilities: Job Responsibilities:

1. Installation of devices
2. Servicing at consumer households
3. Responding promptly to customer inquiries
4. Acknowledging and resolving customer complaints
5. Knowing our products inside and out so that you can answer questions
6. Keeping records of customer interactions, transactions, comments, and complaints
7. Communicating and coordinating with colleagues as necessary
8. Providing feedback on the efficiency of the customer service process
9. Ensure customer satisfaction and provide professional customer support.

Requirements: Additional Requirements: 1. Age 18 to 32 years
2. Bangla speaking must be neat and tidy Earnings: Approximately 25,000 BDT
(T&Cs Apply) Compensation & Other Benefits: 1. Festival Bonus: 2
2. Lucrative rewards on achieving periodic targets
3. Salary Review: Yearly Qualifications Required: 1. Diploma in engineering preferably in Mechanical, Electrical/any other discipline. We welcome undergraduates (HSC completed) who are ambitious to learn business and improve their communication skills, leadership attributes and interpersonal networking.
2. Willing to work under pressure, chase ambition and work in team.
3. Must have good communication skill in Bangla (Reading, Writing & Speaking) and understanding of English (Reading & Writing).
4. Ability to ride on motor bike and bicycles.
5. Ability to operate and use smartphone & apps.
